description: This file contains implementation of the basic functions for a C object representing a Service Logic Aggregation Plane component (SLAP) related to a specific object type, including creation, initialization, and destruction routines. It specifically defines functions for managing a container object called SlapOwo Uoac, with functions to create, remove, enroll objects, and initialize the object instance.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapOwoUoacCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new SlapOwoUoac object, setting up its member functions and context handles.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOwoUoacRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the object, resets it, and frees associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOwoUoacEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls required objects into the container object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapOwoUoacInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the object's member variables and function pointers, setting up the object for use.
